definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Five straight days of rain caused flooding.
sentences.chinese: 連續五天的雨勢釀成了水患。

sentences.english: In Thailand, Tzu Chi volunteers arrive in the southern province of Phatthalung to survey damage caused by a recent flood.
sentences.chinese: 在泰國，慈濟人來到博他倫府省水患災區勘災。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Project can radically solve the flood threats of the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 三峽工程可以從根本上解除長江中下游的水患威脅。

sentences.english: The experience of water danger reclamation in synclinal axis illustrating at T312 working face is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了T312工作面向斜軸部水患治理的經驗。

sentences.english: Sp: A dame can cure the yearly flood of the river.
sentences.chinese: 派一個貴夫人便足以治這條河流的年度水患。

sentences.english: Heavy rain will not only wash away the soil but will cause serious flood as well.
sentences.chinese: 大雨不光會沖走泥土，並且也會惹起嚴峻的水患。

sentences.english: Ever, the Yellow River flooding, has brought the Chinese nation untold suffering.
sentences.chinese: 有史以來，黃河水患，給中華民族帶來了深重的苦難。

sentences.english: India donates US$250,000 to flood victims in Uganda.
sentences.chinese: 印度捐廿五萬美元給烏干達水患災民。

sentences.english: This water conservancy project eliminated the scourge of floods in this area.
sentences.chinese: 這項水利工程使這一帶的水患得到了根除。

definition: (of a watercourse) to breach its banks/(of a dam) to burst
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
(old) to transport by water/to ship grain as tax
